title: Best Android Apps April 2017 [Ep#9] #CoolNewApps
description: So, welcome to the 9th episode of #CoolNewApps. I didn't release, we are close to 1 year now. Awesome :)  Apps links  1. Walls for Reddit (Unreleased)   2. Real Notepad: Notebook   3. Privacy Screen Guard   4. Sync for facebook -   5. Pocket Sense    [Apps that didn't make the list, but still worth checking out]   1. GIF Share Overlay -   Provides an overlay that draws on top of other apps and lets you quickly search and share GIFs without leaving your favorite app  2. Volume Key Cursor Control -  Control your cursor with volume keys. I didn't include this, since gboard already does this by sliding over spacebar key.   3. 1CHAT (notify) - can't find the download link now.  A simple Facebook messenger chat head for Whatsapp.  4. Comic blitz -  Comic reading of all your favorite action.  5. Bard - Video Assembler -  Make your favorite actors or Youtube celebrities. The concept is good but the videos are limited.  6.InstaSwipe Instagram Panorama -  Display your gorgeous panoramic images on Instagram but had to sacrifice the resolution to fit Instagram's size restrictions?  ---------   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use? By The Croft from Joakim Karud  (I didn't miss it this time :p)  What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mike do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  My computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
